characters: Driver of a blue van, driver of a white car, driver of a red truck
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a multi-lane road with moderate traffic. The blue van ahead is maintaining a steady speed, while the white car on the right lane is moving forward. A red truck is visible on the right side, initially behind the white car, and gradually overtaking the self-driving vehicle.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a consistent speed and lane position, following the blue van ahead. The vehicle is keeping a safe distance from the blue van and monitoring the traffic on the right side, including the white car and the red truck.
key_objects: 1) Front: A blue van, approximately 5 meters away, maintaining a steady speed. 2) Right: A white car, approximately 10 meters away, moving forward. 3) Right: A red truck, initially behind the white car, approximately 15 meters away, gradually overtaking the self-driving vehicle.
